intro: Hieracium willkommii, commonly known as the Willkomm's hawkweed, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its dense clusters of yellow-orange flowers, which bloom in late summer and early autumn. The plant typically grows in dry, open habitats such as meadows and grasslands, preferring well-drained soils. It has basal leaves that are usually lance-shaped and covered in fine hairs. Hieracium willkommii is native to Europe and is often found in mountainous regions.
